Project Nature: "(T26) ""Wi-Fi Connected City Programme"" - Provision of public Wi-Fi services in the public areas"
Duties: "- Serve a contract assignment under InfoTech's headcount, full-time second to serve the DPO; ;i) To lead a team to liaise with contractors/service providers, venue owners and government departments to implement public Wi-Fi services at smart lampposts, footbridges, parks, promenade and pedestrian tunnels, etc. under Government-funded and public-private collaboration (PPC) arrangement.;ii) To assess smart lampposts on the feasibility and the cost-effectiveness of providing public Wi-Fi services.;iii) To liaise with contractors and the vendor of smart lamppost on the technical design, installation and on-going maintenance arrangement to fulfil the related requirements set out by Highways Department.;iv) To liaise with the owners of smart devices installed / to be installed on smart lampposts to ensure proper share use of common components, if any.;v) To oversee the project management and implementation of free public Wi-Fi services under the Government-funded and PPC arrangement.;vi) To provide technical expertise and leadership in the design, integration, installation, configuration and deployment of Wi-Fi services at indoor and outdoor venues with high patronage.;vii) To handle enquiries/complaints from the public regarding the Government-funded and PPC arranged Wi-Fi services.;viii) To manage on-going operation of the Government-funded and PPC Wi-Fi services including the monitoring of the availability and performance of the services.;ix) To provide relevant information and input for the promotion of the Wi-Fi.HK brand. ;"
Requirements: "i) Good command of both Chinese and English.;ii) Good writing, communication and organisational skills.;iii) Good experience in preparing technical guidelines and procedures.;iv) Good knowledge in Wi-Fi and mobile technologies.;v) Good knowledge of the local telecommunications regulations, landscape, policies, licensing regime and relevant code of practices and guidelines issued by the relevant authorities.;vi) Good connection with the telecommunications industry. ;vii) Good experience in contract administration of outsourced projects.;viii) Solid experience on Wi-Fi deployment at smart lampposts, footbridges, parks, promenade, pedestrian tunnels, etc. is desirable.;ix) Solid experience in Wi-Fi system for smart lampposts or other smart device implementation.;x) Work experience with vendors of smart lampposts or smart devices vendor is desirable.;xi) Knowledge of relevant code of practices, guidelines and procedures for telecommunications industry and government procedures in handling implementation of systems in government venues is desirable. ;Technical Skills: ;. At least 5 years' experience in Network Design (NDN); ;. At least 5 years' experience in Wireless and Mobile (WLM). ;Non-technical Skills: ;. At least 5 years' experience in contract administration (CON); ;. Excellent written English is a must; ;. At least 5 years' experience in project management (PRM); ;. At least 5 years' experience in site preparation (SPE); ;. 5 years' experience in managing Government projects (MGP) is an advantage; ;. 5 years' experience in work with the Government (GOV) is an advantage. ;- Bachelor's degree/Higher Diploma in Computer Science, IT or equivalent; ;- At least 8 years' post-qualification experience in which at least 2 years' relevant experience in a similar post and in a comparable capacity."

Project Nature: "(T26) System design, implementation and production support for the 2026 Population Census (26C)"
Duties: "- Serve a contract assignment under InfoTech's headcount, full-time second to serve the C&SD; ;To analyse, design, implement, monitor, optimise, and manage the Information Technology (IT) infrastructure for 26C Information Technology (IT) System adopting cloud and virtualisation technologies. The job duties include, but not limited to, the following: ;- To design, build and test the production, development, testing and disaster recovery platforms for 26C IT System; ;- To deploy/migrate application systems to various platforms of 26C IT System in serving business needs; ;- To liaise with in-house technical teams and service contractors, including those assigned by relevant government bureaux and departments, on the setting up and support of application systems hosted on premise and on cloud including, but not limited to, the Government Cloud; ;- To closely monitor and maintain the healthiness of IT infrastructure including hardware and software, and to manage system and data security; ;- To take lead in investigation and troubleshooting in case of production and security incident, if any; ;- To manage anti-virus software and the deployment of software updates and virus definitions; ;- To carry out quality control and quality assurance as designated by the project manager; ;- To follow up recommendations provided by Security Risk Assessment and Audit (SRAA) contractors; ;- Candidate(s) may be required to travel to C&SD's sub-offices and/or other Government premises to provide technical support and may be required to work on weekends / public holidays during operations and system maintenance periods; and ;- Other duties as required by C&SD. ;"
Requirements: "1. Technical knowledge and solid working experience in the management of servers, tape libraries and uninterruptible power supplies from various brands and models. ;2. Technical knowledge and solid working experience in Microsoft Hyper-V virtualization environment, Microsoft Security Compliance Manager and Windows Server Update Services. ;3. Technical knowledge and solid working experience in VMware virtualisation environment including proficiency in VMware vCenter 6 or above, VMware vSphere 6 or above, VMware vSAN 6 or above and VMware vRealize Suite. ;4. Technical knowledge and solid working experience in Windows Server 2012 / 2012 R2, 2016, 2019 and 2022. ;5. Solid working experience in Microsoft Active Directory administration in Windows Server 2012 / 2012 R2 / 2016 / 2019 / 2022 domain levels, especially in Read-only Domain Controller and Group Policy Management. ;6. Solid working experience in Microsoft SQL Server and Microsoft SQL Server Failover Cluster administration in Windows Server 2012 / 2012 R2 / 2016 / 2019 / 2022. ;7. Solid working experience in server management through the use of Microsoft System Center 2012 / 2012 R2 / 2016 / 2019 / 2022, with hands-on technical skills on System Center Configuration Manager, System Center Operations Manager and System Center Virtual Machine Manager. ;8. Solid working experience in server management through the use of Microsoft Internet Information Services (IIS) and Windows Certificate Authority. ;9. Knowledge and solid working experience in conducting system analysis and design, systems programming and software testing. ;10. Experience in feasibility / technical studies and team leading / supervision. ;Technical Skills: ;. At least 6 years' experience in Server Virtualisation Technology (SVT); ;. At least 5 years' experience in Data/File Backup Technology (DFT); ;. At least 5 years' experience in Disaster Recovery Planning (DRP); ;. At least 4 years' experience in IT Security (ITS); ;. At least 4 years' experience in IT Security Scanning Tools (SST); ;. At least 3 years' experience in Microsoft Active Directory Administration (ADA); ;. At least 2 years' experience in Anti-Virus Technology (AVT); ;. At least 2 years' experience in Data Encryption Technology (DET); ;. At least 2 years' experience in Network & System Management (NSM); ;. At least 2 years' experience in Security Risk Assessment and Audit (SAA); ;. 3 years' experience in Virtual LAN/LAN Switching (VLS) is an advantage; ;. 3 years' experience in Data Management (DMT) is an advantage; ;. 3 years' experience in Microsoft Internet Information Services (MIS) is an advantage; ;. 2 years' experience in Microsoft SQL Server (MSS) is an advantage; ;. 2 years' experience in SQL Server Reporting Services (SRS) is an advantage. ;Non-technical Skills: ;. At least 2 years' experience in work with the Government (GOV); ;. At least 2 years' experience in Government procurement/disposal procedures (GPD); ;. At least 2 years' experience in the management and support of Government systems and services (GSS); ;. At least 2 years' experience in vendor management (VMG); ;. 2 years' experience in the support of Certification Authority system (CAS) is an advantage. ;- Bachelor's degree/Higher Diploma in Computer Science, IT or equivalent; ;- At least 6 years' post-qualification experience in which at least 5 years' relevant experience in a similar post and in a comparable capacity."

Project Nature: "(T26) This is a CPM position responsible for development, enhancement and support of e-government services in connection with iAM Smart, MyGovHK and Change of Address (COA) service. The iAM Smart provides the one-stop personalised digital services platform which enables citizens to use a single digital identity to log in and use government and commercial online services by their personal mobile phone. MyGovHK is the personalised website of the Government built with Multiple Application Registration Service (MARS) which enables citizens to go through the processes of user registration, service enrollment and user authentication in a unified manner, bringing them a consistent experience in using e-government services. The COA service enables citizens to enter details of personal or company address once and send the updates to multiple government departments and NGOs in one go."
Duties: "- Serve a contract assignment under InfoTech's headcount, full-time second to serve the DPO; ;The CPM will be required to ;1. supervise in-house teams to perform enhancement projects for Change of Address (COA) service, Central Messaging Component (CMC) supporting iAM Smart notification function; ;2. supervise in-house staff to provide maintenance, troubleshooting, system monitoring and 7x24 technical support on the day-to-day operation of MyGovHK, COA and related systems; ;3. provide technical expertise and advice to B/Ds related to adoption of iAM Smart, MyGovHK, COA service and other related services; ;4. coordinate with B/Ds and other organizations in adopting iAM Smart and integrating with MyGovHK and COA service; and ;5. perform other managerial and supervisory duties. ;The successful applicant will be required to work closely with related project teams and government departments. ;"
Requirements: "1. Candidate should have solid experience in implementation/support of infrastructure / common service serving multiple B/Ds or organisations and running at 7x24 dual-active production sites for high availability (i.e. two or more active sites are providing service concurrently. Failure of the application servers at either one site will not affect the availability of the services.) ;2. Candidate should have practical experience in implementing/supporting join-up public e-services involving the integration of various systems across multiple departments or organization units ;3. Candidate should have hands-on experience in SAML 2.0 or OAuth 2.0 implementation for systems acting as Identity Provider and for systems acting as Relying Service ;4. Candidate should have hands-on experience in implementing mobile friendly and accessible e-services that comply with WCAG 2.0 AA standard ;5. Candidate should possess strong sense of analytical and problem solving skills ;6. Candidate should be hard-working and self-motivated with positive attitude ;7. Candidate should be a team-player with good communication and interpersonal skills. ;Technical Skills: ;. At least 4 years' experience in JBoss Application Server (JAS); ;. At least 4 years' experience in J2EE Development (JDE); ;. At least 3 years' experience in Public Key Infrastructure (PKI); ;. At least 3 years' experience in Web Services (WSV); ;. At least 2 years' experience in Security Assertion Markup Language (SAM); ;. 1 year's experience in EGIS (EGI) is an advantage; ;. 1 year's experience in IT Security (ITS) is an advantage. ;Non-technical Skills: ;. 1 year's experience in managing G2B and G2C projects (GBC) is an advantage; ;. 1 year's experience in quality assurance (QAS) is an advantage. ;- Bachelor's degree/Higher Diploma in Computer Science, IT or equivalent; ;- At least 8 years' post-qualification experience in which at least 2 years' relevant experience in a similar post and in a comparable capacity."

At least 4 years' experience in IT Application Development and Management (ADM); ;. At least 4 years' experience in Document Flow/Workflow Management System (DOC); ;. At least 4 years' experience in JBoss Application Server (JAS); ;. At least 2 years' experience in EGIS (EGI); ;. Duties: "- Serve a contract assignment under InfoTech's headcount, full-time second to serve the FSD; ;Subject to the implementation progress of 4GMS, the CSA will facilitate the following duties related to the 4GMS implementation for the Fire Services Department (FSD):;;(i) to assist the Technical Managers (TM) in the implementation, in particular the Information Management System, of the 4GMS;;(ii) to assist the TM in reviewing, testing and validating the dashboards and reports generating from the 4GMS to present data in a clear and meaningful way;;(iii) to ensure the data integrity, security, and reliability of the data assets through maintenance and optimization;;(iv) to collaborate with other stake holders to understand their data-related requirements and translate them into actionable analytics; ;(v) to carry out other tasks related to data conversion, migration and analysis; ;(vi) to carry out necessary tasks related to the existing mobilising system to ensure a smooth transition to the 4GMS; and;(vii) To undertake any other duties as assigned. ;"

Project Nature: "(T26) This is a CPM position responsible for development, enhancement and support of e-government services in connection with iAM Smart, MyGovHK, Registration of Outbound Travel Information (ROTI), and the Pay e-Cheque service. The iAM Smart provides the one-stop personalised digital services platform which enables citizens to use a single digital identity to log in and use government and commercial online services by their personal mobile phone. MyGovHK is the personalised website of the Government which provides public users a user-friendly and personalised user experience in interacting with the government. The ROTI service enables public users to register and receive relevant overseas travel alerts information from the Government. The Pay e-Cheque service enables public users to upload e-Cheques to settle government bills/fees."
Duties: "- Serve a contract assignment under InfoTech's headcount, full-time second to serve the DPO; ;The CPM will be required to;1. supervise in-house teams to perform enhancement projects for ROTI, Pay e-Cheque service and iAM Smart notification function;;2. supervise in-house staff to provide maintenance, troubleshooting, system monitoring, and 7x24 technical support on the day-to-day operation of iAM Smart notification function, MyGovHK, ROTI, Pay e-Cheque service, and other related systems;;3. provide technical expertise and advice related to ROTI, Pay e-Cheque service and iAM Smart notification function;;4. coordinate with B/Ds and other organizations in adopting iAM Smart and integrating with MyGovHK and related services; and;5. perform other project management related duties.;The successful applicant will be required to work closely with related project teams and government departments. ;"
Requirements: "1. Candidate should possess application development skills using Java Enterprise Edition (Java EE);3. Candidate with solid experience in implementation of e-billing / payment related e-services is an advantage;4. Candidate with solid experience in implementation of mobile app, SAML or OAuth related system is an advantage;5. Candidate should possess strong sense of analytical and problem solving skills;6. At least 3 years' experience in Web Services (WSV); ;.
